DOC.brief_summary: The investigators propose to study oral commercial silver nanoparticle products on human enzyme activity.
DOC.brief_title: In-Vivo Assessment of Silver Biomaterial Nano-Toxicity 32 Ppm
DOC.criteria: 1880 years old without debilitating chronic disease or history of cardiovascular event. Women physically capable of becoming pregnant, who are not using 2 barrier methods of birth control; Any female who is nursing; History of heavy metal allergy; History of asthma or Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease; History of renal impairment; Symptoms of active upper respiratory disease at time of consent; Smoking more than 5 cigarettes or equivalent and not able to stop for 48 hours; Ability to discontinue chronic medications or nutraceuticals for 20 days or 5 halflives of the agent, whichever is longer.
